description: Interacts with Facebook using the Graph API

essential_properties.name: hostUrl
essential_properties.description: The Host URL of the request. Almost all requests are passed to the graph.facebook.com host URL. The single exception is video uploads, which use graph-video.facebook.com.

essential_properties.name: httpRequestMethod
essential_properties.description: The HTTP Method to be used for the request

essential_properties.name: graphApiVersion
essential_properties.description: The version of the Graph API to be used in the request

essential_properties.name: node
essential_properties.description: The node on which to operate. A node is an individual object with a unique ID. For example, there are many User node objects, each with a unique ID representing a person on Facebook.

essential_properties.name: sendBinaryData
essential_properties.description: Whether binary data should be sent as body
